tag_professor: Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Makes it really easy to succeed in the class. 4 papers and 4 tests; the papers can be rewritten until you get an A and he gives you review sheets with the test questions on them.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had Celentano for Intro to Business and am currently taking him for Principles of management. He is the best! Genuinely a nice guy and always willing to help. He wants you to do well and always gives review sheets with questions right from the test. Wish I could take him for many more classes! Would definitely recommend to everyone

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Incredible professor! He genuinely wants his students to do well and cares enough to help you in any way he can. Assignments are due every class from the syllabus and he emphasizes the importance of that, but they\'re pretty easy. Exams straight from review sheet. Very likeable and his lectures are helpful. Wish i could take him again.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: The best professor! He\'s very clear and caring. Always gives review sheets before the tests..easy MC tests. A few group projects but they\'re not hard. HW is just a few questions from the test book. Highly recommend.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Professor Celentano is brilliant and was my favorite professor in my first Freshman semester. His lectures can be extremely boring, but he is occasionally amusing. He is kind, considerate, and experienced in his field. He is fluid, approachable, and lenient in his instruction. He is just a very likable guy. 9/10

comments: Professor Celentano is a knowledgeable and organized instructor who imparts the material in a straightforward and understandable manner. He treats his students with respect and applies course concepts to real world experiences.
